name: kobold
flavor: This humanoid is about the size of a gnome or halfling. It has a scaly hide, a naked tail like that of a rat, and a doglike head with two small horns.

name: rat
killedBy: The rat crawls up your arm and rips out your throat.

name: troll
killedBy: The trolls wicked grin is the last thing you see before everything goes dark.

name: zombie
flavor: It looks like a walking corpse that has seen better days.
killedBy: Zombie grunts happily at your corpse and starts eating.

name: Zombie Master
flavor: This walking corpse appears to be a lot faster and agile than you would expect.
killedBy: Zombie Masters kicks your corpse one final time and calmly walks away.

name: Bob the zombie
flavor: This zombie is wearing a sign that reads:'Hi, my name is Bob'
